original_text: This is what the Lord says: ‘I will now throw out the people who live in this land. I will bring much trouble to them, and they will be in pain.’ This is what the Lord says:
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 보라 내가 이 땅에 사는 자를 이번에는 내던질 것이라 그들을 괴롭게 하여 깨닫게 하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
I will now throw out the people
I will bring much trouble to them,
and they will be in pain.'
This is what the Lord says:
